Description: AllGoodsNetwork - Estate Sale items All items are accurately described ... it's all good at Allgoods. ===================================================================== Welcome to AllgoodsNetwork, this is an all original (and what we feel is Mint) 1981 Epiphone Japan Sheraton in Antique Red. All original, clean and really does sound great with a nice unique Jazz voice. This one has rarely been played, and includes the TKL Hard Shell Case as seen. Both of our Vintage Epiphone Sheraton Japan Guitars listed here for auction have the original MMK Pickups ... super nice tone. We have a few: Guitars, Amps and Parts etc. that we are selling as they became available from an Estate Sale, stay tuned and check back with this eBay site etc. Feel free to contact us for any questions at all, or an in-hand description. --- Shipping Information --- Shipping is very important to us, and as such we spend extra time and use additional packing material so that you receive your item in undamaged condition and fully insured. Shipping is to CONUS only, excluding: APO, Africa, Asia, Central America and Caribbean, Europe, Middle East, Oceania, Southeast Asia, South America, and PO Boxes . -----------------------------
Title: 1981 Epiphone Japan Sheraton, all original, clean and sounds great - NO RESERVE!
